name: IN 55 WORDS - FOR GRACE VANDERWAAL FANS
name_original: IN 55 WORDS - FOR GRACE VANDERWAAL FANS
description:
This Fan Club song-writing game gives you the power to be the songwriter that you know you are.

In 55 Words app helps you finish your song quickly by turning song writing into a game where the goal is to make a song that is exactly 55 words long.

A word counter does the word counting for you.

Create and finish writing an original song in as little as 3 minutes with this amazing app.

After that, share your creation to our website to receive votes from the In 55 Words community.

Songs ranked in the Top 100 will show up in the app’s rank tab for all app users to see.

*Features*
- Pick from themed backgrounds
- Pick from solid color backgrounds
- Change background color to any other color you like
- 14 different font colors
- 1 line for title & 5 lines of song text
- Each text line able to be a different color
- Each text line able to be aligned left, right or center
- Word counter counting from 55 words to 0 words left
- undo and redo functionality
- Save to Camera Roll and others through share sheet
- Share to FaceBook
- Stores your songs in-app so you are able to edit them, later
- Rank list of Top 100 Songs as voted on by community

Grace Vanderwaal Theme: this theme was designed to entertain fans of Grace Vanderwaal and to attract more fans through the ability to share in-app creations to FaceBook and other social media sites.

This app is not associated with Grace Vanderwaal nor does it make any claims to be associated with her.

Any and all profits from this app will go toward promoting Grace Vanderwaal because she is a great kid who makes a lot of people smile.

Community: The app displays the rankings of user images created by using this app that have been shared by uploading their created image to the website: http://GraceVanderwaalLyrics.com
